title: 2 Week Ban
body: So explain to me why do we get banned for being toxic in games, Everyone gets toxic in a game everyone gets annoyed frustrated and yet we get banned for something slipping of our tongs. if we have to play with lanes feeding not warding ect and get toxic when they die our penalty is getting muted due to them ruining our games. now the big question is, if i get permanently banned will rito refund all my money i ever spent on the account and all the hours, because i think its stupid we get perm banned and lose all our valuable skins and time effort and what riot gets away with it? you dont see other games like cod and csgo ect were people use mic to trash talk get banned do you now no! it sounds to me like they are Scamming us bois setting us up just so they can get us to make new accounts and rebuy those skins, all for the money that surely sounds allot like money hungry to me.

replies.body:
Prior to a 2 week suspension, you get chat restricted for 10 games, then for 25 (your punishment can be escalated to a suspension/permaban if you are especially toxic). In general, these two punishments are enough warning for you to take a step back and evaluate your behaviour. 

Even if your teammates are feeding/ being even more toxic towards you, what matters here are YOUR actions (you can report teammates after game for toxicity (btw, not warding and generally being bad are not reportable) and they will get punished according to their actions). During testing times, you have to step and be the bigger person, mute your teammates and continue to play to the best of your ability. Any other actions would simply be contributing to the toxic environment, and ruining the game experience for the other players. 

If you get permabanned, Riot will not refund any of the money spent on your account, as technically you don't even own the account. [Read the ToS here. ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)
well i dont know what game your playing then mate

That is extremely rude, calling other summoners "Subhuman"
Like really, holy crap. Calm down.

Unless your in bronze then you shouldn't care.
People will play in there respected divisions/elo.

I don't care what elo he is.
Control over emotions or not, that's not cool.

There is a guy who replied to this guy who said he cant control his anger.
Is he "Subhuman?". No because that doesn't exist.

People with disabilities or anything like that dont deserved to be called that.
(Regardless if they deserve it)

Him being bronze or angry still makes him human, the same as me or you.

Im probably one of the saltiest summoners in league.
I get so mad when supports (My fav role) refuse to do there jobs or lack basic capabilities of doing there jobs.
Yet I've never been report or even received a warning.

Why?

Because I don't type anything, I don't make other people feel bad. (As much as I really want to)
Because I want to win my games, me spending X amount of time flaming them is making it harder for me to win.
And when/If they feel bad they are only going to play worse and make it even harder for me to win.

You should have received plenty of warnings and small time bans before a permaban.
If you were still persistent in flaming being toxic and etc.
You more then likely deserved the ban, sure people are bad at the game. That happens all the time in everyone's game.
Your not unique and special in this.

------

I don't know what MMR you have or what ELO.
But you get paired with your team mates for a reason, heck maybe sometimes they are not the reason for your loss.
Im pretty sure there have been plenty of games where you fed, and where you did bad.
and either, your team flamed the shit out of you (Like what you got banned for) Or tried to reinforce your situation and helped you.
(Or just ignored you)

Riot isn't setting you up. Their stance on toxicity has been in the spotlight for years, so much so that still believing it is accepted behaviour within this community is sorely mistaken. If anything, you set yourself up by believing you could treat your fellow players in any way you pleased and _not_ get punished. It's isn't too late to change though, you might want to take this as the wake up call.

I suffer from mental illness and the inability to control my anger, yet I don't get toxic in games with feeders or other toxic people.
End of the day that's your choice to be a %%%%.

Also the permaban thing is why Riot changed their Terms of Service when creating the OCE server.
Before hand due to the consumer laws in Australia, Riot would have had to refund everything you spent on the game.
Now however you don't own your account, essentially you are renting your account from Riot, therefore they don't need to refund you anything as you have no rights to "your" account.
